profile.name: Aaron YingCai Sun
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer | QA & Test Automation

about: Senior Software Engineer with 20+ years of experience, including extensive background in QA engineering, test strategy, and quality assurance for consumer and enterprise products. Experienced in both manual testing—including hardware and the software that runs on it—and building automated test frameworks and CI/CD pipelines that keep quality high across multiple platforms and partner integrations.

Expert in Java, JavaScript, and Python in professional settings, with working knowledge of SQL. Skilled in defining test strategies and quality metrics, driving automation efforts, and advising on tooling and methods. Comfortable using AI tools to help write and maintain automated tests and to improve test coverage and efficiency.

Proven track record advocating for quality within cross-functional teams, influencing engineers, product managers, and designers in quality best practices. Former QA team lead and release manager: designed and executed large-scale performance tests, high-availability and stability testing, and coordinated testing efforts to ensure delivery of quality features. Successfully managed test environments on real hardware and simulators, and worked directly with enterprise customers on-site to integrate and validate solutions.

Strong technical leader with experience mentoring engineers, leading system test teams, and making technical and risk trade-off decisions related to QA work. Passionate about the quality we bring to users and invested in evolving QA processes. Collaborative and tenacious mindset whilst remaining curious and flexible. Keen interest in AI-driven testing and automation to take quality efforts to the next level.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | Code-to-Cloud Platform Team
experience.description: Klarna Engineering Platform (KEP) Domain - Code-to-Cloud provides a common, stable platform for Klarna services.
bullets: Ensure final user experience meets quality standards for mission-critical financial services used by 150+ engineering teams
Advocate for quality and stability in centralized cloud deployment platform; monitor infrastructure metrics and troubleshoot issues
Built and maintained AWS automation platform with green/blue and canary promotion strategies; participated in on-call and go-to person rotation for 24/7 support
Migrated client code from TypeScript to Go; led migration of Jenkins jobs to AWS Code Pipeline for CI/CD and deployment automation
experience.technologies: TypeScript, Go, AWS ECS, AWS Step Functions, AWS Lambda, AWS Code Pipeline, Jenkins

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer

Refactored search subsystem for performance and stability; participated in modernization using Kubernetes and ArgoCD (GitOps)

experience.title: QA & Release Manager

experience.title: System Tester
